products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) blinds offer the latest in high quality, easy-to-use fabrics, and the rimini (blackout) in grey is no different, combining the sleek fabric with an effortlessly fashionable light stone grey that is easy to integrate with a range of tastes and styles. Offset the grey against granite worktops and slate floors in a contemporary kitchen for a striking yet natural contrast in tones.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Steel Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The beautiful thing about trinity blackout steel blue is that it allows you to lose yourself in the beautiful world of natural shades and tones. Is it a deep and moody blue? Or is it aqua blue crossed with denim? No one really knows, which means you can make it anything you want. Choosing lighter natural colours is the way to go when you want to enliven your chosen space. Think about ways to add light beiges and gentle stone greys to the mix and you'll instantly fall in love with the end result.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Ash - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in the subtle aesthetic of trinity blackout ash it would be all too easy to think that it's another stone grey fabric. Look closer however and you'll soon see that this couldn't be wider of the mark. It's a gentle grey that has a slightly earthy quality from which it takes it name. The beauty of this type of unifying colour is that it allows you to introduce all sorts of other shades into your chosen space.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Soft Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you how love the simple elegance of everyday colours combined with flawless craftsmanship, their new trinity (blackout) soft grey fabric has everything you've been looking for. It's all about taking the time to appreciate what it adds to your space, and then pairing it with the complimentary touches that will make all the difference. As you take in the serenity and tranquility of trinity (blackout) soft grey you can sense the ideas coming together.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Pewter is a blackout fabric with a difference, and one that we guarantee you'll fall in love with the moment you see it in your home. It's all about introducing natural tones that introduce an understated sense of style. Simple, authentic, and homely; these are the 3 words which instantly come to mind. Sit back and take in the different creative avenues that you have at your disposal and you'll be able to take your decor in an exciting new direction.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Stone from their ever-popular trinity blackout range allows you to add a calming combination of country chic and contemporary minimalism to your chosen space. It's all about enjoying the relaxing nature of the fabric, and using it to create a space you never want to leave. Sitting back and thinking about which direction you want to take your decor in is the name of the game here. Do you go contemporary? Or do you go down the country route? The choice is yours, and the options are incredible.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a shadow you think of the absence of light, but what if you could turn conventional wisdom on its head? Trinity blackout shadow welcomes you into a world in which nothing is quite what it seems, and your dark fabric is actually a natural charcoal that brings any space to life. We love the idea of pairing shadow with light lively natural shades to provide some natural balance and contrast.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout steel is the subtle blend of greys and metallic blues that is set to be one of the breakout colours of the season. It's one of those intersectional colours that allows you to add a unifying presence to any room in the house, and to do it all in a refined and elegant way. If you want to be able to connect the various features in the bedroom then steel could be the hub you've been waiting for.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Flint - Roller Blind
products.description: When it comes to natural colours that allow you to introduce a unifying sense of calm to your chosen space, trinity blackout flint may just be the answer you seek. It's colour is true to its name, and allows you to take your decor in a dozen difference directions. If you want to be able to introduce natural textures and still keep the contemporary look you love, think about real wooden furniture and leather seating to match your new rollers.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The one thing that we love about trinity blackout light grey is that it allows you to lose yourself in the moment the instant you set eyes on it. Take one look at the finely woven fabric and you get a sense of the regal calm you could add to your decor. We love the idea of hanging light grey against some pale magnolia walls, and above a light pine effect laminate floor. That way you can celebrate the way in which these neutral shades compliment one another as you sit back and take it all in.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Platinum - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, trinity blackout platinum combines the perfect night's sleep with the touch of luxury that no home should be without. The striking colour catches the eye from all angles, and is the perfect addition to the contemporary home in search of a subtle tweak. If you want to be able to create the relaxing little haven that will allow you to drift off to sleep the moment your head hits the pillow, platinum makes it happen.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma's fuscous grey is a neutral, lead shade that's ideal for the modern styled home. The sturdy fabric is great for light control, whilst not entirely blacking out a room. All of their roller-blinds use quality aluminium tubes so they're easy to move - totally fuss-free. Pair with whites and other neutrals for a monochrome look, or with bright yellows or limes for a funky, current style. The perfect blind for a fresh, contemporary office, striking when coupled with light woods, white furniture, and the latest tech.

products.title: Roma, Grey Nickel - Roller Blind
products.description: Halfway between a grey and a beige, the roma roller-blind in grey nickel is the perfect neutral for all kinds of dcor styles. Its hardy fabric offers privacy while still allowing some light to penetrate through. Use amongst pretty florals for some country chic or with plain, but bold colours like royal blues and deep reds for a contemporary style. Grey nickel makes the perfect window accent in a country kitchen or contemporary hallway - or indeed, any style room.

products.title: Deanna, Cool Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The cool grey deanna is best described as a natural stone grey that yields an appealing and calming finish. The colour is beautifully complemented by the distinctive free-flowing nature of the deanna patterning. Cool grey works well in a wide range of colour schemes. Place in a monochrome bathroom amongst white enamel and light-toned tiling, or with deep reds or burnt oranges for a modern living or dining room.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Code - Roller Blind
products.description: Soothing and luxurious, the cool grey splash (blackout) code adds a sense of tranquillity to any room. This shimmering blind is easy to clean making it a practical choice as well as a stylish one, not to mention the easy-rolling mechanism that it hangs from. Create a feeling of sanctuary in your bathroom by pairing with an all-white or pale grey scheme, and accessorising with pops of colour. The code will match most shades, with turquoise and green being popular options.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in light grey is soft in colour but hardy in quality, and despite its pale hue, has excellent blackout properties, blocking out any kind of light you need it to. Tame bold reds, bright blues, or neon greens or complement slate greys, ebony blacks, and stark whites; the choice is yours. This is the perfect blind for a monochrome bathroom for a contemporary or industrial look.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: Combat those long nights of disturbed sleep by opting for the origin (blackout) in taupe, a quality blackout blind with modern style and opulent colour. This blind will shields against both night-time light and summer-time sun, making it a practical choice as well as a pleasing one. Compliment the taupe with a mild and elegant dcor scheme featuring ivory, biscuit, and caramel hues. Include plenty of compelling textures and sumptuous cloths to create a comforting realm, adding golden embellishments and gilded accessories for a modern, metallic edge to a traditional scheme.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Graphite - Roller Blind
products.description: The slate shade of the origin (blackout) in graphite is about as contemporary a colour as you can get, and its high quality blackout properties make it practical as well as stylish, as do its durable yet lightweight fabric and easy-to-use rolling mechanism. Use amongst bold reds or cool blues in your home office, or give a rustic living room or dining room a modern twist. This blind will look particularly good when paired with light to medium woods and off-white walls.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Charcoal - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin in charcoal is a blackout fabric with a difference that's been specially made for those of you who love the contemporary look of this on-trend shade of grey. Deep, earthy, and by far the best way to put your mind at ease at the end of long day. Matching with light woody browns would be an inspired way to continue the natural colour scheme around the room with the click of a button. It's all about feeling peaceful and free, so add in a few throws on the couches and a beanbag in the corner.

products.title: Affinity, Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity in silver combines the distinctive affinity patterning with a barely-there silver fabric to provide a truly stunning interaction between room light and blind, making an ethereal addition to any home. This pretty fabric keeps out enough of the outside world to offer privacy, yet won't totally blackout a room. Couple the affinity silver with a dark navy for a moody yet beautiful bedroom colour scheme, or add a hint of sophistication to a monochrome dining room.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Splash (blackout) grey combines an intricate texture with a swirling and free-flowing pattern to create a design that is sure to catch the eye. The combination of two different neutral stone shades says everything you need to know about this unique approach to design. It's one that's sure to spark your creativity into life. As you recreate your space you want to give some thought to how you'll manage the light as it enters your room.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Slate - Roller Blind
products.description: The functional form of the sarra (blackout) blind in slate is practical yet stylish, offering full protection against uv rays, while also giving a room a cool, almost industrial vibe. The fabric is of the highest quality, with an easy-to-use rolling mechanism to match. The traditional use for grey might be to pair it with blacks and whites for a monochrome look, but how about keeping in with the latest trends and using with yellow and white in the kitchen? Or teaming up with hot pinks in the bathroom or bold oranges in the hall? The possibilities are endless.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection is both an attractive and practical range of quality blinds, with flame-retardant fabric and a modern roller mechanism. Feature the pewter in either a domestic or commercial surrounding for a contemporary look with beneficial practical properties. Combine the pewter with a modern and distinctive monochrome scheme to form a contemporary look full of current and characteristic style.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the cool and contemporary roma (fr) in grey within any surrounding for a modern looking blind with graceful finesse. This lenient and flame-retardant cloth forms an easy-to-use roller-blind with a simple pull-cord mechanism and in a charming, dove grey finish. Combine the grey with a distinctive and compelling palette of white, charcoal, and black shades to form a monochrome-influenced scheme that's full of alluring colour contrasts.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection features flame-retardant fabrics, which makes them perfect for either the family home or commercial site. The light grey edition is sure to blend within any dcor style for a contemporary look with subtle shade. Form an attractive and delicate palette, with an industrial edge, by incorporating the light grey with a soft blend of pastels in vintage pinks and creams. Accent the blind by adding subdued grey fabrics within the rest of the room, adding character and charm with dainty florals and paisley prints.

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna mist is a very modern take on a standard white blind. With a gentle hint of silver and the two-tone effect created by the raised deanna patterning, this blind offers a pretty and classy shimmer. The mist is the perfect addition to any contemporary room and will contrast well with crisp, clean colours and tones, setting off against rich greys particularly well. Use in a bedroom for a bright and airy feel, or in a bathroom to keep the atmosphere fresh and clean.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: The light, pastel shade of the origin (blackout) in steel adds a perfectly neutral accent to any window. Its cutting edge blackout properties mean that it will keep out even the brightest rays from the sun, yet you won't be compromising on style. The steel contrasts wonderfully with its sister browns and beiges, yet also tempers bolder colours such as burgundy or emerald when needed. Use to complement contemporary patterns in the kitchen or bold blues or greens in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to add a subtle stone grey to the mix that has a hint of urban chic, origin stone is the fabric that makes it possible. It's more than just a unique touch of style, and thanks to the blackout fabric it allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. The perfect marriage of style and functionality. Taking your time is the way to create spaces you love, so why not give your new project some extra thought? Lightly sanded floors, magnolia walls, and striking wall art to finish everything off.

products.title: Capella, Carbon Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about carbon silver is that it manages to combine the charm and sophistication of two metallic finishes in perfect harmony. The silver shines under the light, and the carbon provides balance and stability that allows you to transition between more luxurious pieces as you move around the room. Use carbon silver in the dining room where it can partner your new glass dining table with chrome frame.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: The natural weave of the anthology in moonstone gives you the best of it all; the benefits of a high quality dim-out blind, plus a light, outdoorsy feel. The grainy, woven fabric provides a blind that's built to last. Beige will match almost any dcor scheme, but the moonstone will look especially stylish in a contemporary country dining room, surrounded by deep browns and soft creams, or set against bolder reds in a cosy bedroom, where you can curl up and relax.

products.title: Kindling, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too. The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior.

products.title: Dune, Aztec Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune aztec stone is a fabric that we're proud to call their own, and it's easy to see why when you take a closer look at it. The minimalist design works in perfect harmony with the neutral base colour and relaxing shades of brown. Just what you need to soften the ambience in any room. If you want to create a look that instantly makes you feel at home then the bedroom is the ideal place for aztec stone.

products.title: Capella, Silver Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the contrast between the delicate silver thread of silver blush and the soft pink foundation fabric. It has that cute and cosy feel that all decor should, and yet it's the luxurious choice of pattern that really shines through and catches the eye. When you have your heart set on putting your own stamp on things it can be frustrating looking for your perfect match. We created silver blush for those of you looking to blend homeliness, luxury, and a little hint of country style.

products.title: Crosshatch, Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: Crosshatch silver combines a classic geometric pattern with a striking silver that is sure to make a little noise. It's a pattern that seems to reverse depending on the angle of the light, and one which is finished with aplomb by the slightly blueish quality of the silver threads. Combining silver with a dark charcoal is a great way to emphasise the elegance of the shimmer. It's all about giving the threads the platform they need to speak for themselves, so don't be shy about organising your room with this purpose in mind.

products.title: Karma, Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: If you are looking for a dark and moody colour that still adds some light and sparkle to your home, karma taupe could be just what you need. The background glistens and shimmers, making any space feel alive and energetic. And at the same time the matt finish of the trees give it a slightly sombre and tempered feel. A truly thought-provoking contrast. Take your time with taupe, and look to add matching patterns to your wallpaper and scatter cushions.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: Moonstone from their anthology (blackout) range allows you to introduce a blend of white, beige, and grey to your colour scheme with the click of a button. Its intricate weave and clever patched style of colouring provides a depth and subtlety to proceedings that you perhaps weren't expecting. Take your decor down the contemporary meets country route by adding in some stencil signs on the walls, shabby chic furniture, and a little cracked leather for good measure.

products.title: Morning Mist, Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The morning mist spring is one of their most beautiful and finely crafted blinds. Made from a fine quality, lightweight fabric, spring is printed with a truly stunning range of life-drawn, blossoming wildflowers. Sure to add a sense of artistry that relaxes and entertains in equal measure, the natural colouring and designs of the spring make it an ideal addition to a country-themed kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Morning Mist, Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Morning mist autumn is a beautifully crafted filter blind made from the finest lightweight fabric. Printed with a quite wonderful autumn-scape of wildflowers, this blind is sure to add a touch of artistry to whichever room in the house you choose to hang it. A perfect way to add some beauty to a room, the autumn would look striking in a living room or dining room, where you can show it off to friends and family as you relax in the evening.

products.title: Etching, Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Etching pewter combines a contemporary geometric print with a more traditional textured look that gives your new roller blinds added depth and clarity. The way in which the light greys ebb and flow is sure to set your mind at ease, and leave you with plenty of time to consider how to elevate your decor further. Matching to pewter is all about being subtle with your colours, and clever with your use of space.

products.title: Garden City, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on a life of their own, unconstrained by thick outlines or crisp edges. When you want to create a theme that instantly sets your mind at ease there's no better way to do it than to embrace other urban finishes.

products.title: Ashanti, Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti haze is a high quality fabric combined with an effortlessly stylish, contemporary design. The stripes come in various widths, and features lilac, dark purple, fashionable charcoal, and timeless off-white. The way the lilac and dark purple play off one another will add style and character to your home. Why not use the ashanti haze in your bedroom to match your bed linen? Or perhaps use it in the kitchen, where it's uplifting tones are sure to catch the eye.

products.title: Ashanti, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti crimson combines a top quality fabric with a modern, feel-good design, and alternating strip widths give this filter blind a clean, contemporary feel, whilst the crimson highlighting looks fantastic when contrasted against the black and light browns. Use the light brown backdrop of the crimson to match light and dark woods, as well as country-themed areas in the house. Then let the crimson stripes stand out on their own, and provide your room with a little dash of colour.

products.title: Abstract, Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Abstract stone gets its name from the texture that inspired it, and it's easy to see why. The timeless quality of stone is something that endures and inspires in equal measure, so what better basis for a great addition to your interiors? As the colours drift into one another you are left to ponder precisely how the delicate balance was struck. Matching to the abstract range is all about going in search of complimentary textures.

products.title: Visage, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you need when you want to create a space you never want to leave. Allow yourself to be inspired, and add plenty of matching light woody beiges to the mixing pot. This is their advice to you if you want to be able to reframe your living room and bedroom.

products.title: Ashanti, Olive - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours. The olive adds mellow green stripes to the backdrop of cream, grey, and black to form a cool, contemporary look. The olive is perfect for when you want to add a few dashes of natural green to a room, without dominating it with a pure green, one-colour blind. Why not make a virtue of the green stripes, and use the olive to subtly change the colour scheme of your room? Ashanti, olive - roller blind the ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours.

products.title: Daphne, Charcoal - Roller Blind
products.description: The daphne in charcoal is a simple and neutral blind with a pretty and wistful dandelion fairy patterning. The fabric is soft and light, so light can filter through even when the blind is closed, and the smooth, effortless rolling mechanism makes for durable, easy-to-use window covering. Pair the charcoal with light browns and soft taupes in the bedroom, for a fresh, natural dcor style. Or instead, complement creams and golds to create a luxurious yet not over the top living space or dining room.

products.title: Luster, Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of luster grey is the way in which it breaks up the traditional single colour fabrics with dashes of white. It gives the whole blind a larger than life quality that lets the light flow around your room without saturating the existing colours. Introducing other finely detailed finishes would be an inspired choice if you want to continue the theme around the room. Look to the natural world for inspiration by focusing on the huge variety of wood grains that you can introduce with your furniture and flooring.

products.title: Africa (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: There's nothing more awe-inspiring than standing back and immersing yourself in the intricacy of the tribal stylings of their new africa blackout shadow fabric. It gives any space your heart desires an added layer of depth and clarity, and it even has the splash of colour that can be so hard to integrate. Match shadow to some tribal themed wall art and you'll be able to turn the master bedroom into the homely and inspiring space that you love to relax in at the end of a long day.

products.title: Seaside (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of seaside blackout stone is that it allows you to get lost in the moment like no other contemporary patterned fabric we know of. Just what you need when you want to create the light and homely space you never want to leave. Use blackout stone in the kitchen to add a contemporary touch of style that will allow you to get truly creative. By matching it to the tiling and flooring you'll be able to create a secondary layer that compliments the kitchen units and worktops that so often dominate the heart of the home.
